column1: #Text=Yue says : " Why is he sitting like that ? "
#Text=Katara says : " He 's meditating , trying to cross over into the Spirit World .
#Text=" Aang says : " How about some quiet ?
#Text=Come on guys , I can hear every word you 're saying !
#Text=" Katara says : " He 's crossing into the Spirit World .
#Text=He 'll be fine as long as we do n't move his body .
#Text=That 's his way back to the physical world .
#Text=" Yue says : " Maybe we should get some help .
#Text=" Katara says : " No , he 's my friend .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Well , are n't you a big girl now .
#Text=" Katara says : " No ... " Zuko says : " Yes .
#Text=Hand him over and I wo n't have to hurt you .
